name: SONOHIGURASHI VS. TOUHOU UNIVERSE
description:
■Game content
90's-style 2D fighting action in which real-life men fight in cosplay.
The first work in the series.
* This work is a secondary creation game work based on the Touhou Project.

This game is
This is a minor update version of "sonohigurashi vs touhou1" sold in 2010.

18 playable characters and 18 stages in total!
Of course, there is a dedicated BGM for every stage!

■Game mode
[ARCADE]
It is a mode to fight the CPU battle.
Depending on conditions, boss branching and multi-ending.

[VS]
In this mode, you can play local matches with your friends.
(Single [1 ON 1].)

■story
With Hinamizawa Village
Gensokyo ...
Two worlds that should never intersect
It has become one.

[Development tools]
・ 2D Fighting Maker 2nd
